summary: An Riften style look of Shor's Stone
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS]As you enter Shor's Stone on your way from Riften,you say goodbye to Riften
last time before you find yourself in true North.[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Shor's Stone gives you the chance to wave that goodbye to South and Riften as it architecturaly reminds of Riften.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]But that is not all.[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]You quickly conclude that this settlement depends on its Ebony ore veins as you see the entrance to main Redbelly mine.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]There are also two mine wheels which pull iron from secundary veins.Near those wheels is a carpenter,as this settlement shows its industrial face.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]And an main blacksmith with his production facility which is impressive as it suits this vital economical location.[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]If you want a drink,you can find that in Redbelly Inn,an Inn in which all workers spend their free time.
Inn is in greater building,and [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]other part of that building is Warehouse for East Empire Trading Company which plays main role in ebony market.[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]If you curve from main road,and go a little bit behind inn and warehouse,you will find an living part of Shor's Stone,
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]composed of farmhouses and ecologicaly shaped.[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]There is also an Private Atelier which belongs to Cyrodiilian painter,who is temporary absent.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]That is a story of Shor's Stone :)
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]I recommend that you also install mine mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89523]Chapels Of Skyrim[/url]﻿ ,as it puts Chapel Of Zenithar in Shor's Stone,which kind of clicks into.


[/font]All credits to :
-Strotti
- Oaristys
- Lor
- Runs
author: ibrica_orahovac
